choices: a room at his Aunts house
a room at a friends house
1.content:
James is 17 and looking for a new apartment or room away from home before he looks into starting college.
He searched the Internet and finds...
1.title: Moving In

11.content:
Alright, what kind of apartment?

Single's - you'll be moving into a place that could either be appropriately sized for one person, or it could be large enough for more than one individual and someone else could move in with you at a later date

Shared with family member(s) - perhaps an aunt, uncle, cousin, older sibling, or other relative has an extra bedroom, and they are willing to let you stay there, so long as you pay the rent

Shared with friend(s) - one or more close acquaintances (maybe from school or someplace else) is offering an extra bedroom. Your friends could be male, female, or both (meaning there could be more than two roommates).

Shared with stranger(s) - someone you barely or hardly know has a bedroom available, and although you are not familiar with this person or persons, you figure you may as well give them a chance

Other - this is the category where everything else, such as studio apartments and the works, would apply
11.title: an apartment

113.content: Your friends from school have a room at the last moment, it's bare aside for a bed. On the day you move in, they mention something about a gift on the bed "just for you". It's
113.title: Shared apartment with friend(s)

1133.content:
(Hey, just so you know, this is not a continuation from the previous post; it's a continuation from the second post in this chain. I intended to add a few options in the friend or friends, male or female category)

James sat in front of his laptop at his desk, browsing through the apartment listings. He was determined to find a suitable apartment for himself. Ideally, one that was located in a reasonably safe neighborhood and fairly close to his college so his commute would not be too long.

For a while, it seemed as though his search would prove fruitless. Most of the best options had already been filled, and there were not many worthwhile vacancies left.

However, he managed to find one availability that was in a very reputable subdivision, and it was just a few blocks a way from his college campus.

Best of all, the party offering it was someone he knew!
1133.title: Something else

11332.content:
It may have been odd for two college aged people of opposite genders to share an apartment together (unless of course they were involved with one another), but that did not bother James. He hoped it would not bother his friend either.

He briefly reviewed the terms and conditions of the agreement. Most were pretty basic and understanding, and he already met all of those. No smoking; check. Clean record; check. Must be able to pay half of rent when it's due; check.

There was only one condition that stood out to him: "Must be willing to adhere to dress code."

Curious, he looked up this particular apartment complex, and as far as he could tell, the guidelines mentioned nothing about a dress code. Then he realized; the other lodger was the one with the dress code. However, the dress code was not really specified anywhere in her profile.

Nonetheless, James figured whatever the dress code was, it would not be unreasonable. Probably just no see-through or revealing clothing, or something like that.

In any case, this was by far the best option. Everything else was either too far away, in a dangerous part of town, or owned by a total stranger.

Thus, James filled out an application and submitted it.

Within twenty-four hours, he was notified that his applications had been accepted, much to his delight.

Before going any further, what exactly is this girl to James?
11332.title: Female friend

choices: She is wearing normal attire (i.e. shirt and jeans or skirt and blouse)
She is wearing something more infantile
113321.content:
The girl currently living in the apartment was James' friend, Bethany. The two of them had known each other since the first grade. While Bethany had never been James' best friend or even one of his best friends, he had always regarded her as a good friend.

Additionally, although James had never had a crush on Bethany, he could not deny that she was a beautiful young woman. Her long black hair, her D-cup breasts, and her unblemished face were enough to turn heads. James knew she was very kind and intelligent, given how the two of them had shared so many advanced-level courses back in high school.

James was content to remain just friends and nothing more with Bethany, but he was willing to allow some room for their relationship to possibly grow into something more. Provided that she, too, was willing, of course. For now, he was more interested in her place of residence.

A couple days after his application was accepted, James packed up his stuff and loaded it up into the car. He said his good-byes to his parents and siblings, promising to see or talk to them soon, and then he drove off.

Less than an hour later, he arrived at the apartment complex. After checking in with the landlord, filling out the proper paperwork, and getting his key, he went to the apartment he and his lifelong friend would be likely be sharing for the next four years.

Even though he had a key, James thought it would be more chivalrous to knock on the door instead of going in straight away. So he did so, and a moment later, Bethany answered it.

Remembering her proviso about the dress code, James took note of her apparel
113321.title: A platonic friend

1133212.content:
When she opened the door, Bethany was clad in a pink, frilly dress. The sleeves and bodice were very poofy, and the skirt ended well above her knees. One would think the dress would have looked more suitable on someone half her age.

James was more than a little stunned to see her in that ensemble. The two of them had gone to private schools, so most of the time, they had worn school-issued uniforms. On the occasions when James saw Bethany outside of school, she had always worn age-appropriate attire. As such, her current guise was a very sharp contrast to her usual clothing preference.

Be that as it may... she did look cute, and it strangely complemented her curvaceous figure. Even so, James elected not to say anything about her clothing just yet.

Instead, he forced himself to smile and say cordially "Hey, Beth. How are you doing?"

In response, Bethany smiled back and hugged him, saying "I'm great. God, Jamie, this is so exciting. You and me, roommates!"

"Yeah, who would've thought," he remarked bluntly, hugging her back. If she was this thrilled to greet a childhood friend, James wondered how Bethany would react when her boyfriend or even her husband came home to her. That was a strange thought. Why did I just think that? he wondered.

He quickly pushed that thought out of his mind. When Bethany pulled away, she asked him "Can I give you a help with your things?"

"If you don't mind," he told her. He had not brought very much luggage, but he would have appreciated some assistance.

"Of course, I don't," Bethany insisted.

The apartment was located on the third floor, so the two of them went down the staircase to the ground. There, James unlocked his car and unloaded his stuff. Being a gentleman, he took all the heavy objects, and he let Bethany handle the lighter ones. If they moved efficiently, it looked as though they would be able to bring everything up in two trips; three at the most.

When the two of them headed back up the stairs, Bethany went in front of James. He was about three steps behind her. From that angle, he could inadvertently see up Bethany's dress. He tried to avert his eyes, but he found it was difficult to look away.

Despite his best efforts, he could clearly see what Bethany was wearing underneath her dress, which was
1133212.title: She is wearing something more infantile

choices: time to change into your underoos
11332121.content:
You could see they were pink polka dotted and frilly. It looked like something a 4 year old girl would wear, not this beautiful girl.

"Lol nice panties, Beth."

She just giggles, shaking her beautiful ass a bit as she walks upstairs.

"This is my room," she says motioning to the room to the right. You pop you head in and find a frilly pink princessy rooom with a big canopy bed, and a pretty wite table set for a tea party. Again, more fitting of a girl then a grown young woman.

"And this is your room," You step into the room on the right. Your eyes go wide when you find its a giant nursery, with a big crib sitting by the window.

"Alright roomy..."
11332121.title: Girly panties

11332122.content:
James noticed Bethany's underwear was not any sort of conventional panties. It crinkled slightly with every move she made, and it was rather thick. So thick, in fact, that she was waddling a bit.

It occurred to James; perhaps Bethany's dress was not the only infantile thing she was wearing. Or even the most infantile thing.

He chose not to bring it up for the moment. Instead, he concentrated on getting his belongings into the apartment.

After dropping off the first load of his stuff off in front room, he and Bethany headed back down to his car. It looked as though they only had to make one more trip. They gathered up the remainder of his possessions, and after James locked up his car, they went back up the stairs. Once more, Bethany walked in front of James when they ascended. This time, she shook her hips somewhat enticingly. It was almost as though she KNEW he could see up her dress, and she was teasing him.

When they were back in the apartment, James and Bethany carefully set everything on the floor. Before he worked on moving his belongings into his room, he decided to address what he had just seen.

He turned to Bethany and said "Hey, Bethany?"

"Yeah, James?" she said in response.

He paused for a moment before continuing with "I know this is a very odd and somewhat improper question to ask a girl, but... what are you wearing under that dress?"

Most girls would be shocked or appalled by such a forward question, but Bethany did not react negatively to it. She just smiled, reached down, picked up the hem of her skirt, and lifted it up. It turned out that beneath her dress, she was wearing
11332122.title: Some type of padding

choices: James agrees to try a diaper
James tries to talk Bethany out of it.
113321221.content:
It turned out Bethany was wearing a bulky, white disposable diaper. It was large enough to perfectly fit her bottom, and it hugged her hips and legs.

It looked like a baby diaper, but it could not have been one. Bethany was far too big to fit in anything meant for an actual baby. James was sure of that; he stood just under six feet tall, and she was just a little shorter than him.

Still, as startling as this discovery was, James thought Bethany just looked even cuter than she did before. In an odd way, the diaper suited her lovely frame.

"What do you think?" she asked curiously.

"It's... nice," James muttered awkwardly.

Bethany just kept grinning. Then she reached out, took James' hand, and placed it on the front of her diaper. She bade him "Go on, feel it."

James hesitantly brushed his hand along the front of Bethany's padding, and he noted how soft it was. He was careful not to rub too low. Just because Bethany allowed him to touch her below the waist, that was not an invitation to get risque with her.

"It's really nice and soft," James thought aloud.

Bethany smiled again and said "I'm glad you think so. Pretty soon, you'll be wearing one, too."

James froze at that. "Come again?"

"This is part of what I meant by 'dress code," she commented bluntly. She leaned closer to him and stated somewhat pleadingly "Give it a try. Please?"
113321221.title: A disposable diaper

1133212211.content:
As ridiculous as this request sounded, James figured there were plenty of worse things Bethany could have done. After all, he HAD agreed to abide by the dress code, and perhaps putting on a diaper might actually be fun. He could not see how at the moment, but maybe later he could find out what Bethany got out of wearing them.

Aside from that, if he refused, she might have had grounds to ask him to move out. They may have both lived in this apartment, but she was still the original tenant, and she had every right to evict him if he did not comply with her rules. Of course, it was unlikely she would throw him out for such a trivial reason, but James decided he would rather not risk jeopardizing his new apartment and his friendship with Bethany just for something as silly as this.

"Okay, Beth," James agreed, only a little reluctantly, "But no one else is going to know about this, right?"

"Don't worry, Jamie; this will stay be between us," Bethany assured him, "The dress code only applies when we're inside. Outside the apartment, you're free to wear whatever you want. In here... I pick what we wear."

"I think that's fair," James declared.

"Wonderful," Bethany uttered, smiling once more. After a bit of silence, she took hold of James' hand and said "Come on. First I'll give you a brief tour of the place."

James allowed his cute, diapered friend and new roommate to show him around their flat. The living room was up front. The kitchen and laundry closet were to the left of that. To the right, there was also a short corridor which contained five doors. Two of those were closets. The other three were rooms. One of these rooms was full adorned and colored mostly pink, like something made for a princess. Obviously, that was Bethany's room. The room across from that was mostly bare. That would be James' room. Bethany said he was free to decorate it any way he pleased, but she would have been happy to offer some suggestions.

Although James had brought a couple folding chairs with him, his car had not been large enough to hold the rest of his furniture, such as his bed and desk. His mother would be arriving sometime later that day with them.

The third room - the one at the end of the hall - was locked. Bethany reached into her dress, pulled out a key, and unlocked it. Inside was a nursery, but everything was sized for an adult.

Bethany brought James over to the changing table and announced "Now, let's get Baby Jamie into his nappy!"

couple of closets and three rooms.
1133212211.title: James agrees to try a diaper

choices: Bethany keeps James in just his diaper
Bethany finds something for James to wear
11332122111.content:
"Uh, okay then," James mumbled uncertainly.

"You're not having second thoughts, are you?" Bethany asked hopefully.

"No, no," James reassured her. As hesitant as he may have been, he had already agreed, and he would not break his word. "It's just that... well, I've... never put a diaper on anyone before. Including myself."

Bethany perked up at that and giddily offered "That's okay. I'll help you get into one."

James was astonished by that offer. "But wouldn't you see my... you know?"

"Well, that IS kind of how it works," Bethany stated sarcastically, "Tell you what: you let me diaper you, and I'll let you change me later."

"Really?" he stated in bewilderment. She nodded, and he assumed "You don't mind about me seeing that part of you?"

Bethany shrugged and argued "Since we're going to be roommates for the next few years, we're going to see each other naked at some point,"

"I suppose so," James conceded. There was an interval of silence, and then he said "Alright, Beth. You can do it."

She smiled again. Then she proceeded to help James out of his clothes. She took off everything: his shoes, his socks, his shirt, his pants, and his boxer shorts. When his underwear was removed, James involuntarily covered his manhood. Bethany softly urged him to move his hands away, and she told him reassuringly "It's alright. Just relax."

Once James was fully naked, Bethany helped him onto the changing table. Then she pulled out a jar of baby oil, a bottle of baby powder, and a large white disposable diaper, similar to the one beneath her childish dress.

Bethany spent a couple minutes covering James' pubic region with the oil and powder. Her hands were delicate and gentle. James felt his manhood quiver when she touched him down there, but he managed to avoid getting erect. Once his crotch was coated in oil and powder, Bethany unfolded the diaper and slid it underneath him. She swiftly pulled the front up between his legs and taped it shut on both sides.

Thus, James was lying there, in nothing but a diaper, in front of one of his oldest friends.
11332122111.title: Bethany diapers James

113321221112.content:
After she was finished diapering James, Bethany spent a few seconds running her hands along his padding, checking to make sure it was on securely and properly. After determining that the diaper was a perfect fit on him, Bethany patted James' diaper and placed a kiss on the front of it. Then she moved further up the table and kissed James on the cheek, saying "Thank you for agreeing to this."

"It's no problem," James insisted. That was not entirely untruthful. As baffling as this scenario was, James could not deny that the diaper was comfortable, and wearing it seemed to make Bethany happy. Perhaps he could actually come to enjoy wearing them.

"Okay, upsy-daisy!" Bethany cheerfully called out, helping James back to his feet. Now he stood in only his diaper in front of his female roommate. He looked down at himself. The diaper was thicker than he thought. It spread his legs apart. No doubt he would be unable to walk straight in these. But he could put up with that.

"Well, as adorable as you look in just your diapers," Bethany remarked, causing him to blush, "You're a little under-dressed right now. Let's get you something to wear."

She took his hand again and led him over to a wardrobe in the room. James followed her, waddling in his diapers.

The wardrobe was full of a number of juvenile garments. Most, if not all, seemed even more babyish than Bethany's dress. Still, James was open to giving them a try. He liked the diaper; perhaps he might like this childish clothing, too.

"What would you like to wear?" Bethany asked
113321221112.title: Bethany finds something for James to wear

choices: James tries to use the diaper
1133212211121.content:
''How about that one'' James said and pointed to a blue, striped onesie with buttons at the crotch. ''That's a good choice, I bet you'll look super cute in this'' Bethany said and helped James to put it on. ''I was right, such a cute baby!'' she cooed and gave James' padded bum a playful pat. She complimented his new outfit with a pacifier, which James accepted after a bit of hesitation.

They then went to unpack his things and while doing so, James remembered Bethany mentioning something about letting him change her later. He mustered up the courage and asked ''Umm, so you said that I can change later. So does that mean that uhh...'' Bethany smiled and answered ''That I use them? Yeah, of course! And so will you, that's what they're for.''

Jamie blushed again, wearing a diaper is one thing but actually using them is a whole lot different. But he figured he'll just go with it since it's Bethany's place and her rules. ''So what's it like...using them?'' James asked, since his last time using a diaper was back in his toddler days which meant his recollection of such thing wasn't exactly bright.

Bethany smiled again and told James ''Well I like it, it's fun to just let it all into the diaper and I've already gotten so used to it. See for yourself and give it a try''

So next...
1133212211121.title: A onesie

choices: He brought a few just in case
113322.content:
he knew Jane for a while and james would do anything for her, maybe she knew that when she had him sign with the agreement of the a dress code.

He started moving his stuff into the spare room the second he could. But did he need to bring his own clothes?
113322.title: A crush of his

James catches a train down to the city and takes a cab to the house.
A tall woman mid thirties answers the door.

He stepped inside and followed her to the room.
"I'm Amy by the way, and this is the room, I just have the bed for now" Amy announced.

"I'll take it!" James replied.
"When can I move in?" He asked
12.title: a room for rent

122.content:
"Oh I see" James replied.

"Why don't you spend the next two weeks packing up and I'll have everything ready?" Amy asked.

James thought about it, a little later then he thought but still the best price he could find.
"Ok I'll be back in two weeks ready to move in" James decided.
122.title: In a few weeks, the room is not ready...

1221.content:
James arrived at Amy's house with his pile of bags.
Amy helped him carry everything in.
"There! That's all of it" Amy said.

"You must be thirsty" Amy stated. She grabbed a jug of water and filled a glass.
James downed it and gestured for another. Amy quickly gave him a refill.
"Can I see the room?" James asked before he downed the second one.
"Of course! I just hope you like it!"Amy stated

Amy leads James to his room and opens the door to...
1221.title: Skip to move in day...

choices: And demanded to know what was going on
12211.content:
Amy opened the door and James starred in shock.
The room was a pale blue with Paw patrol and spaceship wallpaper.
The bed was replaced by a white crib with blue sheets and a mobile hanging over the top. Next to the crib was a high chair and a very well stocked changing table. On the other side a large tv, playpen and toy chest.
James shook his head in disbelief...
12211.title: A fully furnished nursery

122111.content:
A couple hours later James came to.
He groggily sat up and realized he was in the crib.
"Wait a second" James exclaimed
He was dressed in a blue footed sleeper with mits and no doubt had a diaper on from the crinkling sounds.
James stood up for a few seconds before he fell to his knees.
He tried a second and third time, to no avail.
"Why can't I stand up?" James asked himself

James crawled around in the crib unable to stand for what seemed like hours.
Suddenly he felt the need to pee really bad.
122111.title: And fainted

1221111.content:
James decided to just let go considering he didn't have any other options.
He emptied himself into the diaper and felt it swell up against him.
He just realized he wet himself, and now needs a change.
"Amy? Amy? Are you there?" James yelled out

A minute later Amy entered the room.
"Oh! You're awake, and you're wet!" Amy stated.
"Good thing I changed you" she cooed.

James was about to get a word in when Amy stuck a pacifier in his mouth and lowered the side of the crib. She lifted him up to the changing table and quickly wiped, powdered and diapered him.
Amy zipped him up and lifted him again...

choices: Puts James back in the crib
12211111.content:
Amy brought James over to the high chair and removed the tray.
She quickly lifted him in and strapped him into the five point harness.
Amy locked the tray in place and left the room.
James spit out his pacifier onto the tray.
He looked at the pacifier and started to tear up.
'Why am I crying over this?' James thought.
He tried to pick up the pacifier but the mits made holding it impossible.

A minute later Amy entered the room with a large bowl and placed it on the tray in front of James.
She tied a bib around his neck and mixed the white mush with a large rubber spoon.
Amy scoops out a large spoonful and shoves it into James mouth.
James is gagging and drooling as Amy steadily continues to spoon feed him.
Finally the bowl is empty, James gives a sigh of relief when Amy empties the bib out into the bowl and continues to spoon feed him. Every last drop is in James' stomach and he is full to the brim. Amy...
12211111.title: To the high chair!

122111111.content:
Amy wiped James and removed the bib, then carried him over to the crib.
Amy tucked James in, put a pacifier in his mouth and locked the side of the crib.

"Have a good nap sweetie" Amy stated
She turned on the mobile and a baby monitor, then dimmed the lights and left the room.

James looked around and quickly focused on the mobile spinning above him. The toys, dim lights and soft melodies were hypnotic to James.
He soon found himself sucking on his pacifier subconsciously.
James started reaching out to grab the toys when they passed by.

Completely entranced with the mobile James hadn't noticed Amy watching him, Amy....
122111111.title: Puts James back in the crib

Wake up acting like a 2yr old
1221111113.content:
Amy walks up to the crib and lowered the side.
James was still focused on the mobile as Amy unbuttoned her shirt.

'Seems like he's well hypnotized' Amy thought

Amy unhooked the nursing bra on each side and leaned over James.
She slowly lowered her nipple to his mouth and squeezed a drop of milk onto his lips.

James instantly latched on and started sucking as hard as he could.
Amy was shocked and jumped a little.
Amy gently massaged her breast towards James.
James kept a strong and steady pace quickly draining Amy.
She pulled on his lip to break the latch and switched breasts.
James quickly resumed and emptied her in a few minutes.

"Oh my!" Amy exclaimed
"That worked a lot better then I anticipated" she stated
Amy wiped James and stuck the pacifier in his mouth.
She locked the side of the crib and left the room.
1221111113.title: Gives James a quick breastfeed

12211111132.content:
James awoke hours later, his thumb firmly planted in his mouth as the pacifier was somewhere lost in his crib. Still tired he slowly sat up. He wanted out of bed but there were bars in the way, mainly he wanted to play with some colorful wooden train set on the floor.
"Aaammmmmmyyyyyy!" He called with distress, unable to think of how to get out of the crib. She appeared instantly and smiled as she saw James sitting up, with half-open, dull eyes still sucking his thumb. He reached his free hand out to her, making a grabbing motion in the air.
"Aww, dose baby want upies?" She cooed. James just nodded.
12211111132.title: Wake up acting like a 2yr old

12211111133.content:
James woke up and took a look around,
'Still in the crib...' he thought
James sat up and thought about his options here. He didn't remember much of the last few days.
Amy walked into the room with a bottle,
"Oh, you're awake!" Amy stayed
"It's Amy right?, I just wanted to ask... what happened yesterday?" James asked

Amy thought about how to answer for a minute, "I've been taking care of you" she replied.
"Like a baby, right?" James asked
"Yes" Amy replied

James looked into Amy's eyes and asked "I dont remember it..."
Amy quickly replied "Do you want to remember what happens today?"
12211111133.title: Wake up acting normally

122111111331.content:
"Yes! I want to remember it" James replied.

Amy paused for a minute.

"Ok, ok, as long as you listen, let's try it out for today" Amy replied curiously

Amy unlocked and removed the top of the crib, then lowered the side and lifted James over to the changing table.

She quickly changed his diaper and into a blue onesie with firetruck cartoons.
She gently gave James his pacifier and carried him downstairs to the couch.

Amy unbuttoned her shirt and unclipped her nursing bra. James starred at her sucking on his pacifier. Amy pulled the pacifier out of his mouth and brushed his hair with her fingers.

James curled up in her arms and started sucking on her nipple.
Amy placed her finger on his bottom lip and gently pressed down until he'd latched completely. "There you go" she said stroking her breast

James was practically having an orgasm as he sucked on this big soft breast filling his mouth with warm sweet milk.
Amy wrapped her arms around him and hrld him tight.

Amy helped Jamer turn around and continued on the other breast.

James felt the stream slow and nearly stop, Amy quickly wiped his face and placed the pacifier in his mouth.

Amy continued to rock him, and eventually brought him to his crib and tucked him in.

122111112.title: Puts James in the playpen

122112.content:
"What's the big deal?" James shouted as he looked around at the room. "Did you rent the room to someone with a baby? I thought you were renting the room to me?"

"I am renting to you," Amy replied. "You are going to be my little baby roommate."


"Nuts to this," James said as he turned to leave.

James began to feel dizzy. Was there something in the water? He shook his head and began to walk towards the door. Each step became harder, and he soon needed the wall for support. His legs gave out from under him and he crashed down onto the floor.

Amy laughed as she stood over James. I think it's time for you to get out of your yucky big boy clothes and into something much cuter. She took James' hand and helped him to his feet. James felt compelled to listen to Amy even though his instincts were telling him to escape. She lead him back into the nursery.

When Amy released James' hand he felt a moment of clarity. The haze in his mind vanished and his legs felt strong. Now was the best time to escape while Amy was distracted. James turns and...

James turned away and took a step towards the door.
He felt warmth between his legs and quickly realized he wet his pants.

James blushed and looked down at his feet humiliated.

"Let's get you changed into something more appropriate" Amy continued
Amy led James to the changing table and removed his pants and boxers.

Amy powdered and diapered James.
She dressed him in the footed sleeper and lowered the safety bars.

"Time for.......
1221122.title: Wets his pants

12211221.content: "..a nice bottle." Suddenly your pacifier to removed and replaced with the blue nipple of a baby bottle, you can't help but start to suck on it as you're laying on your back still in the crib. But only for a second as Amy, using just th3 bottle guides you to sit up. You do as you want to keep drinking for some reason. The milk is warm and sweeter than any milk you've tasted before. James is standing in nothing but a bulky cloth diaper in front of at least a dozen young or middle-aged women, several of whom he knew from outside of his mother's bridge club.

He blushes furiously and struggles in vain to hide his padding from their view, but to no avail. Some of the ladies begin to giggle at his hopeless attempts. Or maybe it is his diapers or he himself they are laughing at.

"Sophie, he's adorable!" One of them tells his mother.

"You're so lucky; you get to have your baby boy back," another one says.

Sophie shrugs and says plainly "He told me he wanted to be treated like a baby. We had a contract and anything. What could I do but indulge him?"

"That's so sweet," a third one says. Her name is Irene. She is Sophie's best friend, and she happens to be the mother of James' best friend, Douglas, "I wonder if I could get Doug to do the same..."

"Well, if you do, be sure to let me know," Sophie requests, "Maybe he and Jamie could have a play date!"

James blushes again, still unable to look any of the women in the eye.

15111111111.content:
"The lawn needs mowing, Baby," Sophie declares, patting James on his diapered seat, "Hop to it!"

James goes pale and remarks "But Mom, I'm not wearing anything!"

"That's not true," Sophie counters, gesturing to her son's padded crotch, "That's all you need."

"You know what I mean," James mumbles uneasily.

"You only need to mow the lawn in the backyard," Sophie informs him, "The fence is solid wood, and high enough that no one will see you."

"No one else, you mean," Irene points out.

Sophie chuckles at that. She comments "True. Now, go on. The sooner you get out there, the sooner you can come back in here."

James is not really pleased with that compromise. On the one hand, he can go outside and be by himself, but run the risk of revealing his diapered state to neighbors. On the other hand, he can stay in here without anyone else seeing him, but he will be surrounded by his mother and her friends.

At any rate, he decides to obey Sophie. James does not want to give her reason to spank him in front of her friends.

As he waddles off to retrieve the lawnmower, he is stopped by Debra, who says "Hold on, Sophie. Since he's just in his diapers, a lot of his skin will be exposed to the Sun. He better wear sunblock."

Sophie and some of the other mothers mutter in agreement. "Good thinking, Deb."

Sophie leaves for a moment and returns with a bottle of sunblock. She asks James "You want to put this on yourself, dear? Or do you want us to do it?"

He sat up and drank his bottle, when it was empty he looked over to his pacifier.
"Mom" he shouted
James thought about waiting, but he was still hungry. "Mom?" He shouted.

'Maybe I try crying like a baby would' James thought.
He tried his best to immitate a baby crying and quickly got carried away.
When Sophie opened the door James was crying loudly and tears running down his cheeks.
She quickly lowered the side of the crib and helped James over to the rocking chair.
Sophie craddled James in her arms and gently rocked him.
James started to calm down, Sophie took the second bottle and started to feed James.
The bottle was empty after a few minutes and James looked up at his mother.
"Thank you mommy" he said softly
"You're welcome sweetie, I can see you're getting used to this" Sophie replied
"Do you want to try nursing?" She asks
15112111122.title: Drink it now

info.brief_description: Moving into a new place has unexpected consequences. AB/DL adult content
info.description:
Rules:
1.) No "fat" adult baby stories.
2.) The only regression allowed is MENTAL
3.) The plot cannot interact with each other. (Secondary characters are only things that are allowed to be used in the other plots!)
4.) No sex
5.) No swearing
6.) No ridiculously long paths
7.) Entries MUST be at the length of a paragraph; one sentence is not acceptable.
8.) Have fun!

-AndreX
